alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 1:47AM MDT until July 19 at 2:30AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Todd County in south central South Dakota... South central Jackson County in southwestern South Dakota... Northeastern Bennett County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 230 AM MDT/330 AM CDT/. * At 147 AM MDT/247 AM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Vetal, or 22 miles northeast of Martin, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Upper Cut Meat around 300 AM CDT. Parmelee and He Dog around 305 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Grass Mountain, Saint Francis, Two Strike, Soldier Creek, Ring Thunder, Rosebud, Fairgrounds Housing and Lakeview. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
